Html:
This was on the wish-list for a long time but it finally happened, DefinitelyTyped has a website!

http://definitelytyped.org

We're still fleshing it out with guides and information, but we got it to a point where it looks like a real website.

Most of it is about TypeScript type definitions, but we also have a big section with TypeScript community resources. This content was lifted from an existing repo we had for a while, but it is now integrated with the rest of our information.

And this is where we'd value your contributions:

If you know cool projects, tools or libraries that relate to TypeScript then please go ahead and send Pull Request with new links.

There is a content contribution guide on the site.

You can even add links without leaving your browser if you use the code editor on Github.com (it is a crappy widget but will do for some markdown editing).

Looking forward to your visits and maybe some new links :)
Awesome! Looking forward to watching this grow over time. I'll take a look and send suggestions if I see any.
